1 maalaea the blue from sky above the ocean below arrowed sheet of horizon coming straight to my eyes and from the inside once upon a time in early childhood there was a sound akin to something so intimate it reminded me of nothing less than the hiss and plash of the world outside the womb we were on a narrow road in a jeepney on an island approaching the sea for my first time and it was waves the sound of waves on a beach white noise of the universe sea wind water sand and i am brought reverentially back to that moment from here where i stand on this beach maalaea the interpenetration of color and memory forcing me away from the thingness of body the passage of time the sensation of place the essence of blue

2 maui that dream the other night in it i had told her it was nothing like id ever felt before as i held her close then i told him it was a secret id never divulged to anyone but now was doing it to him for them as i held him closer then shortly when we moved to form the circle and to hold hands before yielding forward a child interposed himself asking me to hold him and then suddenly the whole world felt right in a way it had never been before it was us maui in that moment of longing and sadness and love and loss and all became clear and understood prayerfully manifestly one without the physicality of being but with the most complete knowing that had ever possessed me in waking or in dream

3 hawaii this place when we arrived here near to 40 years ago it did feel like coming home finally and with a sense of rightness that defied any logic not that of history of resistance of escape of revolution here at last we had come to a place of refuge like so many had done before us in search of a different life but hoping for the same manifestations of cloth plant music love taken in hand by the vagaries and nuances of life in a different archipelago the alien words nevertheless strung with familiar sounds syllables sensations these were islands atop an invisible but manifestly powerful spot on the surface of the planet that defined just one thing hawaiii our longedfor beloved eternal place

4 honua the earthen and elemental beauty of all this is such that there is a ringing in me right now something is vibrating to the aweful spirit of things and has found me at long last it has found me that it speaks of a deepening existential crisis to our kind ensconced both subtly and permanently to the outer skin of our home planet is something that by rights should paralyze but instead it galvanizes in the sound of these crashing waves a reminder that the notions of the children unencumbered by the hoary leather of cynical adulthood are to be welcomed as the possessors of hope that they are poised as we all are between the infinite catalepsis of nothingness and the familiar old young thingness of this earth

isolation project self portrait for our second isolation project we were tasked with taking a self portrait in the portrait we should include something that has been with us in isolation or that represents our isolation i chose emotion our emotions are always with us and ive taken the time during isolation to try and really understand my emotional state and acknowledge it what you see is a story starting with silliness flowing to boredom depression and anger then follows acceptance and a will to take charge of an emotional state which then evolves to seeking support from those around you leading to light and happiness ive included the before images and the final edited images to make the edits i used affinity photo for ipad in the images i used a darker colour palate for the negative emotions which get gradually darker and grainier as they progress as the emotional state moves into a more positive mental state the images get lighter brighter and the light becomes more intense all photos where taken using an iphone 11 pro max using the wide lens the iphone was on a tripod using a remote shutter and the light is provided by a large window for ambient light and an additional adjustable key light for the record i think its important to not think of less desired emotions as negative while they can feel that way at the time its important to see that without them we would never feel happiness we all have dark times its good to acknowledge and accept them and to deal with them mcrisoproject
